title: watchOS 9 to bring redesigned watch faces, Blood Pressure feature delayed until 2024
content:
The Apple Watch is one of the best wearables currently available on the market. Whether you’re interested in its fitness features or other handy ones that aren’t health-related, it’s a device that truly packs a lot of technologies in its tiny chassis. However, for the past few years, watchOS updates haven’t been very interesting —

The post watchOS 9 to bring redesigned watch faces, Blood Pressure feature delayed until 2024 appeared first on xda-developers.
description: watchOS 9 could refresh the watch faces and introduce an improved Power Reserve mode. Blood Pressure monitoring might be delayed until 2024.
